entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] Go to implementation does not work on interface methods and LSP becomes unresponsive/broken #68649
  • Add Analyzer warning when an identifier in the local scope is overriding a type from the outer scope #68648
  • Don't accumulate interceptor information outside of batch compilation #68646
  • Codelens reference counting is not updating when references are removed in other projects #68639
  • Roslyn API broke in upgrade from .NET SDK 7.0.302 to 7.0.304 #68638
    17.7 P3
  • [DebuggerStepThrough] and friends won't step through to other code if a property accessor is called from within the affected method #68634
  • MissingImports is not respecting .editorconfig #68632

Closed

  • Source generators run very unreliably (especially with multi-targeting) #67123
    Backlog
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #63645
    C# 12.0
  • Void virtual methods with no body #68636
  • Source Generator files with directories are not displayed correctly in IDE #68489
  • `FieldAttributes.NotSerialized` has been marked obsolete #68626

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix msbuild for real this time #68651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68645
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Avoid loading Roslyn through All In One Search when Roslyn isn't loaded yet. #68644
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid `Span` creation when indexing into an inline array with a constant. #68642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Correctly handle trivia in inline statement snippets #68633
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Fix LSP completion edit span computation #68643
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use newer version of msbuild #68647
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move ExtensionTypeTests to Emit2 project #68641
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Small perf improvement during code action computation. #68631
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Refactor BindExtensionMethod method and add some assertions #68599
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address a prototype comment #68613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Convert xml references when moving to primary constructors #68615
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ArrayBuilder.AddMany #68625
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `for` and `forr` snippets #68508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Suppress formatter-based serialization warnings in MetadataWriter #68627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Telemetry Package version to 17.7.47 #68528
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VisualStudioProjectFactory: import the solution service once instead … #68630
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use primary constructors in the 'Features' layer. #68622
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in MergedNamespaceSymbol.SlowGetChildNames #68614
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, 17.7
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #68623
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
